Slide 1 of 5 Slide 2 of 5 Slide 3 of 5 Slide 4 of 5 Slide 5 of 5 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
1300 3rd Ave N, Nashville, TN 37208 (opens in a new tab) (615) 953-0012 infoNASH@pelatorestaurant.com 
5pm - 9pm
Monday - Thursday 
4:30pm - 10pm
Friday 
Brunch: 11am - 2pm / Dinner: 4:30pm - 10pm
Saturday 
Brunch: 11am - 2pm / Dinner: 4:30pm - 9pm
Sunday Pelato Dining Information 
Due to high demand, dining is limited to 2-hours per table. Please arrive promptly for your reservation. Management reserves the right to return tables into rotation 2-hours beyond the reservation start time, or once all sales have been exhausted.

Outdoor dining available year-round in our heated, covered, & enclosed patio.

Reservations are advised both inside and on the patio, walk-ins are always welcome. Seating at our main bar and back bar is first come first serve. Click the reservation link for availability.

Local street parking & paid parking lots are available in the area.

20% gratuity will be applied to groups of 6 or more.

Split payments may be divided up to 4 credit cards at equal value. We do not split checks by item or by different increments - please plan accordingly if you are splitting the check with your guests.

A corkage fee of $45 will be applied to any 750ml wines brought by guest – limit 2 per table.

A dessert plating fee of $5 will be applied to any desserts brought by guests.

Groups of 9 or more are subject to our
Large Party Reservation Policies. 
A $10 per person (2 to 8 guests) or $30 per person (9 or more guests) fee will be charged in the event of a no-show or if reservations are cancelled within 24 hours of reservation start time. Cancellation fees will be waived for re-booking a new reservation within 2 weeks as a one-time courtesy, and will be charged at the full amount of the original reservation if cancelled twice.

F&B minimums apply to groups of 9 or more. Inquire with host team for details & large party policies.

Sunday Sauce

Sunday Sauce (for two)

Also known as Sunday Gravy, this time honored classic evokes memories of weekends & family gatherings in which mom or grandma presided over the constantly stirred pot of sauce & meat, and various relatives were tasked with procuring the essential provisions. Our family is proud to share this tradition with your family every Sunday night.

fusilli, tomato, ribs, braciola*, sausage, meatballs

SUNDAYS ONLY - Limited Availability

*contains pine nuts

Pelato Dining Information 
Due to high demand, dining is limited to 2-hours per table. Please arrive promptly for your reservation. Management reserves the right to return tables into rotation 2-hours beyond the reservation start time, or once all sales have been exhausted.

Outdoor dining available year-round in our heated, covered, & enclosed patio.

Reservations are advised both inside and on the patio, walk-ins are always welcome. Seating at our main bar and back bar is first come first serve. Click the reservation link for availability.

Parking available on-site

20% gratuity will be applied to groups of 6 or more.

Split payments may be divided up to 4 credit cards at equal value. We do not split checks by item or by different increments - please plan accordingly if you are splitting the check with your guests.

A corkage fee of $45 will be applied to any 750ml wines brought by guest – limit 2 per table.

A dessert plating fee of $5 will be applied to any desserts brought by guests.

Groups of 9 or more are subject to our
Large Party Reservation Policies. Get Directions (opens in a new tab)

Private Events

Charleston
Slide 1 of 2 Slide 2 of 2 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
BOOK AN EVENT
Pelato Charleston has begun booking large parties, semi-private, and private events! 
Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Look no further! Pelato's pre-set menus & sharable plates makes for perfect group! We offer customizable settings for all special occasions. Whether you're planning a corporate gathering, a milestone celebration, or an intimate social event, our versatile spaces and exceptional service will make your event unforgettable. Contact  or
eventsCHS@pelatorestaurant.com Complete the form below for all inquiries 
Private Dining

Amenities

Fully private space separated from the main dining room | 65" media center with Bluetooth, Airplay, and streaming capability abilities | Audio channel for customizable playlists & volume control | Wireless microphone | Customizable lighting levels

up to 70 seated or 100 standing
Capacity: 
Full Buyouts

Amenities

Enjoy all Pelato Charleston spaces and amenities including full bar, outdoor patio spaces, & multi-room dining

up to 200 seated or 250 standing

BOOK AN EVENT

Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Look no further! We offer an exquisite setting for all your special occasions. Whether you're planning a corporate gathering, a milestone celebration, or an intimate social event, our versatile spaces and exceptional service will make your event unforgettable.

For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon.
View events Brochure 
Private Dining

Amenities

Fully private space separated from the main dining room | Private bar | Dedicated restroom | 65" media center with Bluetooth, Airplay, and streaming capability abilities | Audio channel for customizable playlists & volume control | Access to DJ console & wireless microphone | Customizable lighting levels | Disco Ball

Up to 100 seated or 130 standing
